attributes.action: Send Jeremy Corbyn to negotiate with ISIS/ISIL/DAESH
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn has made it clear that he does not believe Britain should engage in military intervention in Syria, rather preferring to negotiate with the terrorists who are wreaking havoc in the region. If this is a viable solution what better person to effect this than Mr. Corbyn?

rejection.details: The actions of the Leader of the Opposition are not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament as a whole.
